moves.1. e4: This is one of my best games played yet - but, I still lost.
moves.1... c6 2. d4 d5 3. Nc3 dxe4 4. Nxe4 Bf5: The book says to move my knight now.  I don't know my openings well yet - compared to my other games, I'm pretty happy with this outcome.
moves.5. f3 e5 6. Ne2 Bxe4 7. fxe4 exd4 8. Qxd: I was feeling good here trapping his pieces - but my lead wasn't so great after all.  Killing his castle is perhaps less important than keeping my pawn.
moves.14. O-O Re8 15. a4 h5 16. Rf4 Nc5 17. Nf: I'd probably not offer this trade if I could do this again.  Nothing in it for me - just isolating my pawn.
moves.17... Nxd3 18. cxd3 Re6 19. b4 g6 20. Nd: A clever fork - but not enough.
moves.23... Kg6 24. Nxd6 gxf4 25. Rxf4 cxb5 26: I wish I would've played Nxb7.
moves.27... Ng4 28. Nf2: Just trade happy, I guess - again, no gain for me.
moves.28... Nxf2 29. Kxf2 Rxd3: I think the game is lost from here.
